title: Can someone explain to me why my runes keep fucking up and giving me random shit?
body:
I really don't appreciate the minion dematerializer and approach velocity picks on Udyr jungle in ranked.. all because the game can't handle having Celerity/Waterwalking every single time I don't go in and reset those two before a match.

Although before it was just giving me an error about it, now it's legitimately just giving me whatever the fuck it wants instead.. In otherwords...

RITO FIX YOUR FUCKING SHIT ALREADY

replies.body: One time that button to open rune page disappeared in ranked for me
